official-title.#text:
To authorize the Administrator of the Environmental
		  Protection Agency to waive any emission standard or other requirement under
		  section 112 of the Clean Air Act (42 U.S.C. 7412) applicable to the control of
		  asbestos emissions in the demolition or renovation of a condemned building for
		  which there is a reasonable expectation of structural failure.
